Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting non-essential helicopter operations at city heliports to helicopters powered fully by electric engines
Items.MatterName: Restricting non-essential helicopter operations at city heliports to helicopters powered fully by electric engines.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.7638-A/S.7216-A, which would establish a noise tax on non-essential helicopter and seaplane flights in cities with a population of one million or more.
Items.MatterName: Establish a noise tax on non-essential helicopter and seaplane flights in cities with a population of one million or more (A.7638-A/S.7216-A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to amend the Hudson River Park Trust Act by banning non-essential use of its heliport.
Items.MatterName: Amend the Hudson River Park Trust Act by banning non-essential use of its heliport.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Federal Aviation Administration to ban all non-essential helicopter travel, including tourist and chartered helicopter flights over New York City.
Items.MatterName: United States Federal Aviation Administration to ban all non-essential helicopter travel, including tourist and chartered helicopter flights over NYC.
